tokens.resolved_gloss: a pasture (i.e. open field, whither cattle are driven); by implication, a desert; also speech (including its organs)
tokens.translation: a pasture (i.e. open field, whither cattle are driven); by implication, a desert; also speech (including its organs)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to spin round (under the influence of any violent emotion), i.e. usually rejoice, or (as cringing) fear
tokens.translation: properly, to spin round (under the influence of any violent emotion), i.e. usually rejoice, or (as cringing) fear

tokens.resolved_gloss: a desert; especially (with the article prefix) the (generally) sterile valley of the Jordan and its continuation to the Red Sea
tokens.translation: a desert; especially (with the article prefix) the (generally) sterile valley of the Jordan and its continuation to the Red Sea

tokens.resolved_gloss: to break forth as a bud, i.e. bloom; generally, to spread; specifically, to fly (as extending the wings); figuratively, to flourish
